name: Joseph Whittle
title: Security Engineer
summary: Security Engineer with progressive growth from IT operations to incident response and cloud security. Led response for 50+ cloud incidents, automated workflows eliminating manual toil, and drove measurable improvements across IAM, endpoint, vulnerability, and compliance domains.
highlights: Directed response across 50+ cloud incidents; reduced resolution time 40%
Centralized Okta IdP for 150+ applications; onboarding time cut 30%
60% faster endpoint detection & response via next-gen EDR migration
Cut over-permissioned access 45% with IAM policy enforcement
Automated IOC enrichment saving ~20 hours weekly manual effort
98% SLA closure rate on high-priority vulnerabilities

achievements: Directed response efforts for 50+ cloud security incidents; implemented playbooks & automation reducing resolution time 40%
Implemented centralized Okta IdP integrating 150+ applications; onboarding cycle time reduced 30% and access changes streamlined 50%
Led migration to next-gen EDR/RMM (e.g., Datto EDR) increasing detection/response speed 60% and reducing false positives 30%
Developed Python & SQL automation for IOC enrichment saving ~20 hours/week and improving detection fidelity
Optimized event monitoring & alert tuning (Datto EDR) boosting team efficiency 25% and trimming alert noise
Enforced IAM least privilege in AWS & Okta cutting over-permissioned access 45%
Automated DSAR workflows improving GDPR/CCPA compliance and reducing customer service labor 35%
Maintained 98% closure rate for high-priority vulnerabilities while halving remediation cycle time
Partnered with IT to design automation workflows lowering operational overhead 40% (provisioning & access control)
Deployed & administered corporate Cisco network (2 floors / 40,000 sq ft) with VLAN segmentation & core redundancy
Owned Windows/Linux systems imaging, patching, and lifecycle management
Integrated IAM workflows between AD & Okta sustaining RBAC policy integrity
Delivered Tier 2–3 escalation support for infrastructure, VPN, and networking
Supported access reviews & SOC2-aligned control audits
Resolved 95% of hardware/software tickets within 24 hours elevating user satisfaction & reliability
Assisted network administration & monitoring improving network uptime 20%
Managed lifecycle of 500+ IT assets with zero inventory discrepancies
Coordinated deployment & configuration of systems aligned to infra standards
Executed logistics & equipment setups for high-demand company events
Managed asset inventory & field logistics across 20+ event teams; optimized shipment tracking & lifecycle visibility
Led combat team during Afghanistan deployment executing mission-critical objectives under high-pressure conditions
